name: Fizzing Pool Entrapment
statusOutcome: Con [TargetName] tan profundo en el grupo de líquidos viscosos burbujeantes, [AttackerName] usa fácilmente su limo para aferrarse a las extremidades [TargetHisOrHer] y restringir el cuerpo [TargetHisOrHer] mientras lo cubre casi por completo en la gao, el rebaño de burbujas le da a [TargetName] unLa sonrisa cachonda mientras el líquido y el cuerpo se burla del cuerpo [TargetHisOrHer] por todas partes.
statusMiss: [AttackerName] tries to completely cover [TargetYouOrMonsterName] in slime, but [TargetHeOrShe] struggles too much!
restraintStruggle: [TargetName] struggles against [AttackerName]'s restraining pool of teasing green goo while the slime seductively presses down from above...
restraintStruggleCharmed: [TargetName] squirms against [AttackerName]'s bubbly pool of slime restraining [TargetHimOrHer], barely resisting the urge to relax into the squeezing, seductive embrace embrace...
restraintEscaped: |f|GetEventAndSetProgress|/|BubbleSlimeCombatEvent|/|0|n|[TargetName] manages to break free of the sticky slime restraining [TargetHisOrHer] limbs! But [TargetHeOrShe] is still very close to the Bubble Slime's plush body...
restraintEscapedFail: But [TargetName] remains bound by the bubbling pool of ooze, leaving the bubble slime to continue to freely tease [TargetHisOrHer] body with melty pleasure!
